          <title>
            <string language="sl">Informatika</string>
            <string language="en">Informatics</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o informatiki v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: informatika, informacijska družba, informacijski sistem, programsko inženirstvo.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about informatics, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: informatics, information society, information systems, software engineering.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informatika</string>
            <string language="en">informatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacijska družba</string>
            <string language="en">information society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacijski sistem</string>
            <string language="en">information system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">programsko inženirstvo</string>
            <string language="en">software engineering</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
